name: "Treatment of nostalgia" by Cinthia Ponce
description:
Works based on Black mirror chapter "San Junipero". 

San Junipero is a virtual reality, where you can permanently move to after you die.
In this virtual reality you can choose to live in your prime.
In this episode of Black Mirror technologies are not portrayed as destructive weapons but also as creators. It all depends on how you use it... You can waste your time in the Quagmire or give your life another chance and accumulate new experiences. The best thing is that you are not locked in and you decide when to disconnect.
